s0001: Imperial Edict to the Imperial Secretary: 'When nobles and kings wish to bestow private favor by dividing fiefs to younger brothers and sons, let each one memorialize separately, I will personally determine their titles and names.'
s0002: The Grand Historian said: Flourishing indeed is the virtue of the Son of Heaven!
s0003: When one person has good fortune, the whole empire relies on it.
s12: Son of Prince Xian of Hejian.
s13: Two. Fifth year first month ren zi, Marquis Liu Ming first year.
s14: Two. Third year, Marquis Ming convicted of plotting rebellion and murder, executed in market, state abolished.
s20: Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.
s21: One. Sixth year seventh month yi si, Marquis Si Liu Cang first year.
s24: Six. First year, current Marquis Zi Dang first year.
s28: Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.
s29: One. Sixth year seventh month yi si, Marquis Liu Cheng first year.
s32: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Cheng convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
s36: Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.
s37: One. Sixth year seventh month yi si, Marquis Ai Liu Dang first year.
s38: First year, Marquis Ai Dang died, no posterity, state abolished.
s44: Son of Prince Ding of Changsha.
s45: One. Sixth year seventh month yi si, Marquis Liu Fu first year.
s48: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Fu convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
s52: Son of Prince An of Chu.
s53: One. Sixth year ninth month after ren xu, Marquis Liu Cheng first year.
s56: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Cheng convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
s60: Son of Prince An of Chu.
s61: One. Sixth year ninth month after ren xu, Marquis Liu Bu Shen first year.
s63: Four. Two. Fifth year, Marquis Ba first year.
s64: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Ba convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
s68: Son of Prince Gong of Lu.
s70: Six. First year tenth month ding you, Marquis Jie Liu Ze first year.
s71: Six. First year, Marquis Shi first year.
s72: Four. Fifth year, Marquis Shi convicted of tribute gold, state abolished.
